entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
